rooms.description: A spacious entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light and ventilation. Vastu guidelines ensure that the door faces North-East.
An open-plan living area integrated with a kitchen and dining area. Floor-to-ceiling windows along West-facing wall provide ample natural light while ensuring privacy.
Modern, open-plan design with high-end appliances integrated into the living area. Vastu principles are considered by positioning the sink and stove in favorable directions.
A dedicated home office space designed with ample storage and a quiet corner. Positioned to avoid direct sunlight from windows while still enjoying natural light.
Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring proper ventilation and natural lighting as per Vastu norms. The bed is aligned eastwards for better energy flow.
Secondary bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows; designed to ensure privacy and optimum light. Vastu alignment ensures balance and harmony.
Additional bedroom incorporating modern design with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern bathroom with sufficient ventilation and privacy. Vastu recommendations ensure that water elements are placed in favorable directions.
A guest bedroom designed to be comfortable yet utilitarian. Floor-to-ceiling windows and Vastu-aligned layout ensure a balanced energy flow.

openings.description: Placed on the North-East side of the house as per Vastu principles for optimal energy entry and balanced light.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural lighting while providing privacy. Located on the West-facing wall as per design preference.
Skylights to enhance natural light in interior spaces and maintain Vastu compliance by allowing sunlight from the North-East direction.

design_principles: Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen
vastu_considerations: Main entrance positioned on the North-East side
Living and office spaces designed to receive adequate natural light
notes.special_instructions: The design is conceptualized as a bachelor pad with a modern aesthetic that aligns with Indian architectural norms and Vastu principles.
